title: How can I boost my immunity without medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 4): By User:DO11.10 - User created, CC BY 2.5, File:Immunity.png - Wikimedia Commons As must be clear from the above classification, immunity cannot be boosted with any medicine (unless we count vaccines as medicines). Our innate immunity is defined by our original genetic make up ...
